name: Jimmy the Flag!
description:
Jimmy the Flag!
Simple game made for the Wowie Jam 3.0 in Godot Engine. The theme was "Failure is progress".
Goal
Your goal is to catch the flag and win the game!
YOU COULD DODGE THE FLAG AND NOT CATCH IT, BUT WHY WOULD YOU DO THAT?
Controls
Move Left and Right with AD (or Arrows)
Jump with W (you can also double jump)
M to turn ON/OFF music.

Music by onemansymphony.bandcamp.com
